PuddleClap.name: Puddle Clap
PuddleClap.description: A tough durable lace made for a hard life. Patterned liquorice band laces are extra wide for increased strength.

SteepedTeaTapper.name: Steeped Tea Tapper
SteepedTeaTapper.description: A light everyday casual lace that will match well with most colours

LollyLagging.name: Lolly Lagging
LollyLagging.description: Fun slim laces with a deep hue that can be smart, but playful

CloverSprint.name: Clover Sprint
CloverSprint.description: A stretchy lightweight lace for active feet and a secure fit.

BoiledLoaf.name: Boiled Loaf
BoiledLoaf.description: A modern stylish lace, built for looks instead of speed.

NumberOne.name: Number One
NumberOne.description: Our most versatile lace, a classic take on the original Onitsuka Futsu laces.
